nodes.text: During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the criminal organization known as the Migrant Merchants' Guild, had a warehouse in the old Galactic Market area of the Galactic City, on the Republic capital planet of Coruscant. Located in the southwestern corner of the Market, the warehouse consisted of an entryway with two rooms branching off, and a secure vault with a blast door was accessible from one of the rooms. In 3643 BBY, the Rodian thief Vistis Garn and several Guild members brought a shipment of weapons and munitions they had stolen from the Republic Military back to the warehouse. However, a young Jedi Knight and the astromech droid T7-O1 tracked the group back to the warehouse and stormed the building, defeating the thugs and retrieving the stolen shipment.

The Guild warehouse is a class-restricted location, or "story phase," for the Jedi Knight class's mission "Stolen Secrets" in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011. It was also mentioned as a Jedi Knight phase in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, released by Prima Games on December 20 of that year.
